problem_text_cn: 点P是正方形ABCD边AB上一点(不与A、B重合),连接PD并将线段PD绕点P顺时针旋转90°,得线段PE,连接BE,则∠CBE等于()
problem_text_en: Point P is a point on the ABCD edge AB of the square (not coincident with A and B), connect PD and rotate the line segment PD clockwise around point P by N_0, to obtain line segment PE, connect BE, then ∠CBE is equal to ()
raw_answer: 过点E作EF⊥AF,交AB的延长线于点F,则∠F=90°,四边形ABCD为正方形,∴AD=AB,∠A=∠ABC=90°∴∠ADP+∠APD=90°,由旋转可得:PD=PE,∠DPE=90°∴∠APD+∠EPF=90°,∴∠ADP=∠EPF在△APD和△FEP中∵≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠ADP=∠FPE}\\{∠A=∠F}\\{PD=EP}\end{array}\right.∴△APD≌△FEP(AAS),∴AP=EF,AD=PF,又∵AD=AB,∴PF=AB,即AP+PB=PB+BF,∴AP=BF,∴BF=EF,又∠F=90°,∴△BEF为等腰直角三角形,∴∠EBF=45°,又∠CBF=90°,则∠CBE=45°故选D.
raw_comment: 此题考查了正方形的性质,全等三角形的判定与性质,旋转的性质,以及等腰直角三角形的判定与性质,其中作出相应的辅助线是解本题的关键.
